Megatron:





Megatron stopped at the entrace ramp of the Predacon base. He looked around, 
noticing the auto-guns were not activated.

"I understand your Hell Beast has left." He had a smirk on his face. "And I 
suppose you have no rightful leader. I believe the only logical thing to do 
would be let an experienced bot, like myself to lead you in the right 
direction."

He waited for a response from the inhabitants.


>From: Inferno731@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: The Rescue
>Date: Sun, 23 Jul 2000 12:38:02 EDT
>
>Inferno notices Megatron coming to the base.
>Inferno: Well, if it isn't the queen. Should have the Autoguns open fire
>Rampage?
>Rampage: No. Lets see if he has a proposal for us. Let him walk in.
